dashboard.title: Health Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back, {name}! Manage your medications and track your health
dashboard.consultDoctor: Remember to consult your doctor before making any changes to your medication regimen.
dashboard.tip1Desc: Drink water regularly, especially when taking medications. Proper hydration helps your body absorb medications effectively.
dashboard.tip2Desc: Take medications at the same time daily to maintain consistent levels in your system.
dashboard.tip3Desc: Note any side effects or improvements to discuss with your healthcare provider.
dashboard.sleepDesc: Good sleep helps your body heal and process medications
dashboard.activeDesc: Regular exercise supports overall health and medication effectiveness

chatbot.title: FarmaBot
chatbot.subtitle: Virtual Pharmacy Assistant
chatbot.disclaimer: This chatbot provides general information. It does not replace consultation with a healthcare professional.
chatbot.errorProcessing: Sorry, there was an error processing your query. Please try again.
chatbot.greeting: Hello! I'm FarmaBot, your virtual pharmacy assistant. How can I help you today? You can tell me your symptoms and I'll recommend over-the-counter medications.
